summary: Tested Pre-Qualify submission with separated time fields and Client modals. Backend APIs 100% working. Fixed bug in client creation endpoint that wasn't saving new fields. UI modals show correct layout without overlay issues.

fixed_during_testing.issue: Client creation endpoint was not saving date_of_birth, time_at_address_years, time_at_address_months, housing_type, rent_amount fields
fixed_during_testing.fix: Added missing fields to client_doc in create_client function (server.py line 634-651)

passed_tests: Pre-qualify submission accepts separated time fields (timeAtAddressYears, timeAtAddressMonths, timeWithEmployerYears, timeWithEmployerMonths)
Pre-qualify submission stores all time fields correctly in database
Create client from pre-qualify maps time_at_address_years/months to client
Create client from pre-qualify maps employment_time_years/months to record
Record notes contain formatted time strings (e.g., '5 a√±os, 3 meses')
Client CRUD with time_at_address fields works correctly
Add Client modal displays all fields without overlay (name, phone, email, DOB, address, apartment, time at address years/months, housing type, rent amount)
Add Client modal fields are fillable and interactive
Housing type dropdown works and conditionally shows rent amount field
critical_code_review_comments: Backend client creation endpoint was missing new fields - FIXED during testing
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Added missing fields to create_client endpoint (date_of_birth, time_at_address_years, time_at_address_months, housing_type, rent_amount)
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-qualify and client time fields are working correctly. Backend fix applied to save all client fields. UI modals tested and working without overlay issues. Test file /app/tests/test_prequalify_and_clients.py can be reused for regression testing.
